website_summaries.verdict: In spite of a few minor issues, these Sperrys are off the charts when it comes to handsome style, lasting quality, and superb comfort once you break them in.
pros: Garners praise for stylish looks, durable structure, precise cushioning, reliable traction, and extended-wear comfort
Versatile look for dressy and dress down occasions
cons: Breaking them in may take a while

customer_reviews.title: Great boat shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a everything a boat shoe should be. Great looks, soft leather, great workmanship and comfortable. The sizing was as expected. A good upgrade from the regular A/O and well worth the extra dollars. If I had to pick a negative, it would be the toe box. It is just a little tight for my liking but not enough to subtract a star. Great shoe, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jimsworld

customer_reviews.title: More comfy than regular Sperry’s
customer_reviews.text: I like the gold cup version of Sperry’s classic boat shoe for several reasons: 1.) they are made with higher quality materials. The exterior leather is much softer, as is the interior deer hide - supper soft when wear without socks. 2.) I’ve been wearing them for many years and the gold cups seem to have a longer lifespan. And 3.) the eyelets on the gold cups are 18kt gold plated and I’m a baller like that.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These gold cup topsiders are the cat's meow. They conform to your foot and look better the older they get. Don't be afraid to get them in salt water. I sail in mine, walk the beach, and they just keep looking better . . . like me. I'm seventy-two and by the time I'm eighty I'll have this pair looking as good as my four-year-old pair.
customer_reviews.author: atwood4242

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shoe & Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He's worn out at least 4 pair thru the years. He now has painful problems with his feet so he has to go easy breaking them in. Ordered a "wide" size for the first time. They'll soon be "perfect" ... only one shoe is a little too tight on a toe (his problem, nothing wrong with the shoe), but good leather shoes will conform to the foot. The customer service was excellent!! Had the shoes within a few days. Can't go wrong with Sperry's Gold Authentics! Gale
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of loafers
customer_reviews.text: With socks, they fit snug; worn barefoot, they slip on nicely. Had to marginally tighten the lacing for the best fit. Comfy to wear and quickly became my go-to shoes for downstairs, although I do notice my feet rolling inwards slightly due to the lack of support. Mine were dark brown and went well with most outfits. If you're going super casual I'd say get a pair in a brighter colour. Bonus: the leather smells great! (l always smell them)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Magnificent

customer_reviews.title: Price went up, but still worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes! It's the first time I was ordering shoes through Amazon. They fit perfectly, and the quality is better than expected. So much so that I decided to get another pair, in a different color, but black is not currently available. What surprises me is that two weeks after my original purchase (July 2020) the price went up 12%... So much for this Honey best price guarantee... Still, even at that price they're worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Christophe Frochaux

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my old brown gold cup A/O’s in which I wore completely out after 8 years of heavy use on the sail boat. As expected, these are of the same consistent high quality I expect from Sperry in their gold cup line. Sperry unfortunately does not include a travel bag with there gold cups anymore which is disappointing. Fortunately I still have mine from previous pairs. Also, I wish they had stuck with the older, classier looking gold cup logo. But that’s merely a small detail.
customer_reviews.author: MarkU

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality, poor design
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a bit over a month now and am honestly very disappointed in the build quality and/or the design for the insole. It seems that the insole starts at the heel and only goes up until right before the ball of my foot which is fine when putting the shoes on but when by taking them off my foot drags the front edge of the insole and peels it back. This happens within a few days and has only become worse. Now the shoes are uncomfortable to wear because the insole doesn’t sit flat anymore so it’s also pressing on the bottom of my foot. I expected better quality from a pair of $140 shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Dardis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I have owned. First pair was $60 more than these from the local mall. Fantastic quality. After many pair of regular Top Siders, these are FAR superior in immediate comfort. These are the real deal. NOT fakes like I saw commented on in another review. Very supple well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket0455

customer_reviews.title: Looks close to the original
customer_reviews.text: I have worn sperry’s for 30 years. These are closer to the originals which are hard to find today. These have regular laces which I really like as opposed to fake lace look today. These are a little pricey for a boat shoe, but I really like the look.
customer_reviews.author: Dana F. Ormerod

customer_reviews.title: Much higher comfort level than the standard Top Sider boat shoe
customer_reviews.text: After I ordered these, I was afraid I made a mistake. I have always had the standard Sperry Top-Sider boat shoe, make that many. Reading the reviews, I decided to step up to the Gold. What a huge leap from the standard to the Gold. The comfort, support and quality is definitely worth the extra price in my mind. They feel more like a shoe and are very comfortable walking in.
customer_reviews.author: Wade I. Treadway

customer_reviews.title: This is the "only" true boat shoe...classic and top shelve!
customer_reviews.text: The best out there...don't waste your time or money on imitations- Sperry has produced the best shoe out there forever...they last forever...mold Perfectly to your foot...a life long relationship!
customer_reviews.author: BLK

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Have had many Sperry products over the years. Have given this shoe limited use thus far, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: I may be prejudiced
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 9 medium. I wear the Docksider barefoot, so I order the 8.5. Best fitting shoe I ever wore.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph White

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of dress shoes. They look and feel amazing, although if I wear them all day and am on my feet a lot, my feet ache for more support
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Sperry Gold Cup Boat Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were as advertised and well priced. These are replacements for an older pair with a deteriorating footbed.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Swiercz

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: These boat shoes look sharp and are very comfortable. I was very surprised by how soft the leather was out of the box, didn't feel like I had to break them in. A little pricy for what I usually pay on shoes but I'm expecting these to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be an attractive and well-made shoe
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, either the shoe is narrower than anticipated, or my foot has become wider.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Z

customer_reviews.title: Sperry Doesn’t Stand Behind Their Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn Sperry Top-Siders for at least 55 years. I love this shoe. However, the current pair had a leather inside sole which became detached immediately. Sperry’s response? Take them to a cobbler and we’ll cover up to $25. On a new shoe?? Very disappointed. I’ve never known Sperry not to stand behind their products. Is the company under new ownership? Or just poorly managed?
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Marlette

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I used to own top siders years ago. Loved them. So I bought the Gold Cup. Guess I got older. No support to talk about. Took out the inside and put in new inside. still no support. They feel nice and soft. thats about it . tight fitting. down over $100. Try them out in a store first.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate Sperry
customer_reviews.text: These are the ultimate Sperry boat shoe. These classic and timeless. And since are part of the Gold Cup collection, they are very comfortable to wear and walk around in. Unlike the original Sperry’s (non-Gold Cup), the sock liner and cushioned insole give you comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes. Lining is so comfortable and are well ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Lining is so comfortable and are well made. Good look and ideal for bare feet. Fit is slightly snug, but am sure after a couple warm days and warm feet, the soft leather lined shoe will form perfectly to my feet. I have owned classic Sperry boat shoes and always liked fit and feel of Sperry. Although these are the ultimate in summer shoes. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: upnorth

customer_reviews.title: Luxury!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn regular topsiders for many, many years but decided to splurge on Gold Cups for once. Love them! Incredibly comfortable. But I'm not sure I can bring myself to hose them off like my regular ones. lol
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: The must comfortable Top-siders I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: They seemed a little snug when I first put them on but felt great after an hour or so. I need a wider toe box than in my youth and that's what felt snug at first.
customer_reviews.author: Barney Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Way too thin
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how anyones foot could possibly be that narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Danielson315

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Casual Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfect out of the box, no break in period. The shoe conforms to your foot and is very confortable. This is my 4th pair of Gold Cups and can tell you they are worth every penny of the extra money to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I live in Southern California and have been a beach and boat person since the 1970's... I've worn Sperry's Topsiders every day since then... I had to buy them then at Kettenburg on Shelter Island even before they were mass-marketed and made in China... Good luck!...
customer_reviews.author: LarryN

customer_reviews.title: A Classic. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Quick delivery. More comfortable than the standard topsider.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: The real deal.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality; just as expected from Sperry - nice color, too.
customer_reviews.author: Felix M. Truex

customer_reviews.title: amazing. The leather is soft and buttery
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship of this pair is, undoubtedly, amazing. The leather is soft and buttery, and makes my usually "nerdy" husband looks much more fashionable :) However, it runs somewhat tight on my his usually normal width feet (he describes it as a 3 on a scale from 1-10).
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Minero

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: These are a significant upgrade over the regular 2-Eye shoes. The insole padding is thicker and more buoyant, and the shoe is better constructed overall.
customer_reviews.author: Stratman351

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line model much more comfortable than the standard sperry. They feel a bit snug at first that's because they are lined with very soft comfortable leather. These are my first Gold editions usually by the originals in leather, don't know yet if their worth the extra money, but five star rating for fit and comfort so far.
customer_reviews.author: J.V.S

customer_reviews.title: An excellent shoe. My favorite
customer_reviews.text: An excellent shoe. My favorite. I have 3 pairs, ranging in wear from "work in the year" to "out with friends."
customer_reviews.author: TomInMD

customer_reviews.title: very soft, comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoes very soft and light.,but the one I received is not exactly the one in the picture online. It should have a word "genuine Lambskin lining"...but they send me different insole logo that make me disappointed. But other than that shoes is good looking, lets wait and see if the quality will last longer...hopefully for years.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great leather
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I usually buy a new pair every summer because I wear them non stop and beat them up but they hold up and still look gear and clean up easily as well
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Leather linings make all the difference.
customer_reviews.text: First time I’ve splurged on Gold Cup, and the leather linings are simply luxurious. Not sure I can go back after this.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry R

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Mayerials and Fit
customer_reviews.text: The leather is top notch, very soft and supple. This and the extra padding inside justify the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Valmore

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite sperry's. They are more confortble but that prety ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sperry's. They are more confortble but that prety much the only differnece between gold cups and authentic originals. If you dont want to spend the money for gold cups its not a big deal. The authetic orginas are just not as comfy on the insole. Great produtc!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the most comfortable pair of shoes I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff R.

customer_reviews.title: he said they were the best fitting/feeling pair of top-siders he’s owned
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my son.....he wanted to return them when he saw how expensive they were. When he tried them on, he said they were the best fitting/feeling pair of top-siders he’s owned! He kept them!
customer_reviews.author: Jean McMullan

customer_reviews.title: Sperrys
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for son, he loves them. Got them at a good price as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Topsider Gold
customer_reviews.text: The Topsider Gold looks great....but if you have foot problems ,you will need your own inserts installed for comfort..this shoe has terrible support... possibly a half size larger shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered!!
customer_reviews.text: These Top Siders are just what I wanted and fit perfectly. Great comfort. The shoes arrived just when I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of shoes the leather is premium and for the price you can’t beat it the only issue is you need to go down half to a full size because they run big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice sturdy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced old shoes - Navy is a great universal color!
customer_reviews.author: Hope you like them as much as we do!

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable and look better everyday with wear
customer_reviews.text: my daily shoes. i wear them both with and without socks depending on if i'm working or not. super comfortable and look better everyday with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Want to know what it feels like to walk on kittens all day?
customer_reviews.text: Then buy these shoes! I was skeptical at first purchasing these boat shoes since I was ok with buying vans which were 3 times less than the price of these. That was until I needed a pair of brown leather boat shoes. Based on my friends recommendation, I decided to pull the trigger on these and never looked back. The lamb skin is the softest leather I've ever felt. The soles and insides of the shoe provide great support and I can wear them all day without taking them off. I took these with me on a trip to Cabo for President's Club and I'm glad I did becase they were so comfortable. You will NOT regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Tango

customer_reviews.title: Son bought these and loves the softness of the leather ...
customer_reviews.text: Son bought these and loves the softness of the leather. He also purchased the no-show socks to wear to protect the inner lining of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: BJacoby

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, overpriced at msrp
customer_reviews.text: Much better contruction than the originals. Minus 1 star because they're slightly overpriced for offshore construction. Price point of $100 would be appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Pacificus

customer_reviews.title: Livin' Large
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Great fit and comfortable right out of the fancy box. Leather is soft and shoes flex well. No complaints cost or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: SPEEDBOY

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Both inner soles started pealing off in less than a week
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Leather so Soft
customer_reviews.text: The leather on these was so soft that it is uncomfortable on my feet. I know that sounds weird, but stick with me here. It's so soft that my feet conform to the leather and begin to sweat immediately. The memory foam heel pad is also completely unneccessary and fell apart on me. I also blew out the sole near the ball of my foot so bad that I bruised my bone. This all happened within three months of buying them. I would have just bought regular Sperry's if I knew they were going to get trashed so easily. That being said, I'll actually just save my money and get another pair of Oak Street's (awesome) or Quoddy's (classic).
customer_reviews.author: BrianAwesomeson

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Sperry
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Sperry just make sure you know if you need the wide version for larger feet.
customer_reviews.author: Championship Winner

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: Heavenly! They are beyond comfortable! I can wear these all the time!
customer_reviews.author: IDreamofBeingAllon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A cut above the plain boat shoes. Use them for "dressier" occasions.
customer_reviews.author: shellback

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking. Very cushy. Rubbed a little on ...
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking. Very cushy. Rubbed a little on outside toe after first day of wearing/breaking in. Leather is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These were even better than I expected. The inside is lined with the softest deerskin and overall the quality is very good. These are now my go-to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Parker's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Supposedly 2E (Wide) width but fit like a D width
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made. I wish I could wear them. I ordered WIDE but they fit like a normal D width shoe.
customer_reviews.author: MrVideo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not shiney, but is soft and nice. Would have preferred 3 lace eyeholes for better support.
customer_reviews.author: frank Sample

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's like walking on air. love the sole and look.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: A great classic shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for a gift for my Dad. He loves them, the fit is perfect and they are very comfortable. The quality of Sperry has remained top-notch over the years so I was confident that they would make a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: ParisLibellule

customer_reviews.title: ... now and they will not stop making the noise like they are soaking wet all of the time
customer_reviews.text: Have had the shoes for about 3 months now and they will not stop making the noise like they are soaking wet all of the time. Super embarrassing going to have to stop wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: these boat shoes were comfortable and require no break-in period
customer_reviews.text: The Sperry Top-Sider Men`s Gold Cup shoes are a little more expensive than it`s competitors, but they are worth it. From the moment they arrived and I put them on, these boat shoes were comfortable and require no break-in period. I`ve worn them continuously since they arrived, only 10 days ago, and continue to be pleased
customer_reviews.author: lwg

customer_reviews.title: Best boatshoes
customer_reviews.text: Sperry know what they’re doing. Simply brilliant boatshoes. Fit like a glove, very comfortable, excellent craftsmanship, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: L P Reichelt

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I ever bought! Great heal cushion inside and the comfort is unbelievable. It may cost a bit more, but it's WELL worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Scott J. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Top-siders
customer_reviews.text: I love Sperry Top-siders and this model is the best. They look great and are very comfortable. The leather is very sofe. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Richard King

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Supremely comfortable and durable boat shoes. The deer skin liner and memory foam foot bed are good for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are made from quality leather and other materials. They fit well, and are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Z

customer_reviews.title: He said they feel great.
customer_reviews.text: My husband just opened them, they were a gift. He said they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharleen Carlan

customer_reviews.title: Huge Topsider fan
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of Topsiders, but they run narrow. Upon receipt of my shoes they were too tight, Since there are no Width options on this particular shoe, I returned them and got the "Sperry Top-Sider Authentic Originals Mens Boat Shoes" in classic brown In 2 E, should have gotten the 3 E but they'll stretch. The only difference is the eye holes are black and they're substantially less money.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and so comfortable. I will be buying another color
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J. Spreiser

customer_reviews.title: Sperry Gold Cups Are The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have about 6 pairs of Sperry Gold Cup shoes and they are all fantastic! I have given up on almost all other makers just because of the rarity of quality in men's shoes these days. I put these on right out of the box and wore them all day. No need to break them in, the leather is soft and conforms to you feet quickly. I highly recommend these Topsiders or any other Sperry Gold Cups.
customer_reviews.author: DLNAO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great shoes. Very comfortable and true to it size. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Slava

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and comfortable. Believe them when they say they run a ...
customer_reviews.text: Top quality and comfortable. Believe them when they say they run a bit large. I had to return and order a half size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Kirk C Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and the leather is really soft
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and the leather is really soft. The lamb skin leather on the inside feels amazing and is comfortable out of the box. I've only had them for a week and I'm expecting them to get better with time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a narrow food. Very comfortable. Replaced a pair that were 10+years old.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man Walking

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes he has
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes! Most comfortable shoes he has!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Veillon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome shoe I have another pair of sperry..it delivers on time and had very nice box, perfect. I really recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: ... has never let me down although I do feel like I'm walking on air with them
customer_reviews.text: Sperry has never let me down although I do feel like I'm walking on air with them.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: Took a few days to break in. Back of ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a few days to break in. Back of the heel was a bit cut up the first go around town.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe that is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe that is very comfortable. I purchased two pair of these in different colors. Unfortunately after 2 months one already has a hole in the deer skin lining. Shoes are warrantied for 45 days. I thought a higher quality shoe would last must longer. My Ferragamos are three years old and look and smell like new. Definitely the superior shoe is the Ferragamo. Dan
customer_reviews.author: Geneva I.

customer_reviews.title: Traditional boat shoe look, but secretly luxurious inside
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing top siders for decades now and still have by first pair of gold cups (they must be at least 15 years old). These new shoes bring the traditional style back to the gold-cup line. This is refreshing since I've never be enamored with square toed shoes like the other shoe in the gold cup line. These shoes are wonderful to wear bear foot since the deerskin is so silky and supple. The one thing that surprised me was how flexible the sole was. Still not sure I like that aspect of the shoe, but that will not deter me from buying another pair!
customer_reviews.author: The Ops Doctor

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality shoes, but not from a good quality seller. I have ordered two pairs of these shoes and both had major defects. I'm starting to think this seller is selling factory defect shoes at full price.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Shoe laces not as shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: i was specting to receive my shoes exactly as shown in the picture, but unfortunately did not. Do you have any tip to tie the shoe laces as it is in the picture??
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN DUCCI CORNU

customer_reviews.title: I Love these Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Sperry's . They are soft, comfortable, and look great. My son-in-law has lots of pairs, but not Gold Cup. He loves them too. I think he'll be ordering a pair real soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sperry Men's Gold a/O 2-Eye Boat Shoe
product_meta.description: The one that started it all, the authentic original boat shoe, a true icon of prep style.
feature_bullets: Luxury lambskin linings surround the foot in ultra-soft and enduring comfort
Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Genuine hand-sewn burnished leather uppers with true moccasin construction and rawhide laces
Luxury lambskin lining surrounds the foot for softness
Genuine hand-sewn moccasin construction for durable, broken-in comfort
Ortholite insole provides added stability and comfort along with a molded cup heel
Razor-cut wave siping on non-marking rubber outsoles that won't scuff floors but give sure footing
